item.title: nvim hardmode in init.lua
item.description: In my quest to learn vim, I stumbled upon a very excellent advise to disable arrow keys and force yourself to use only h,j,k,l movements. Being a former counter-strike enthusiast I know that this method works as I have forced me to learn better keybinds earlier too. And since I am also looking into how to configure nvim properly whilest understanding what I put into my configurations, I decided not to blindly add vim-hardmode plugin.
